name: GridDataInformation
shortdesc: Grid defaults. Note: Applies to named, layout, and frame &#40;story) grids.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the GridDataInformation (a Story, XmlStory, Page, NamedGrid or TextFrame).

property.name: appliedFont
property.shortdesc: The font applied to the GridDataInformation, specified as either a font object or the name of font family. Can return: Font or String.

property.name: fontStyle
property.shortdesc: The name of the font style.

property.name: characterAki
property.shortdesc: The amount of white space between characters.

property.name: lineAki
property.shortdesc: The amount of white space between lines.

property.name: horizontalScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal scaling applied to the GridDataInformation.

property.name: verticalScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical scaling applied to the GridDataInformation.

property.name: gridAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment to the frame grid or baseline grid.

property.name: characterAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment of small characters to the largest character in the line.

property.name: characterCountLocation
property.shortdesc: The character count location. Note: Valid when show character count is true.

property.name: characterCountSize
property.shortdesc: The character size for the character count display.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the GridDataInformation.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameters.name: handler
parameters.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
